Articles.Content: Hey sorry for not posting in the time being but i want to calculate a trans-lunar injection and a return orbit that will take me to KSC using the FASA Apollo Saturn V with out using all the fuel and to make mid course corrections

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aW5ozq4Tqew?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 This video shows everything.
Also, I was going to make a challenge of this.

[Ask a general question that requires lots of details and is actually several questions, get a general answer that will allow you to get to all of them, but will require a lot of work on your part.](https://www.amazon.com/Fundamentals-Astrodynamics-Dover-Aeronautical-Engineering/dp/0486600610/)

This may come across as a bit rude, but it's really a question that will require digging into several different parts of orbital mechanics. So...
